max-width.comment: The maximum width of the Pagination component.

pag-current-link-font-weight.comment: The font weight of the current pagination link in the Pagination component.

link-color.comment: The color of the pagination links in the Pagination component.

link-font-weight.comment: The font weight of the pagination links in the Pagination component.

link-color-hover.comment: The color of the pagination links on hover in the Pagination component.

selection-color.comment: The accent color for selected pagination links in the Pagination component.

selection-link-color.comment: The text color of the currently selected pagination link in the Pagination component.

selection-link-color-hover.comment: The text color of the currently selected pagination link on hover in the Pagination component.

circle-size.comment: The width and height setting of the circle around the currently selected pagination link in the Pagination component.
